Title: Jenkins Job Import Plugin <=2.1 Remote DoS and File Read Vulnerability - CVE-2019-1003015
Discription: An XML external entity processing vulnerability exists in Jenkins Job Import Plugin 2.1 and earlier in src/main/java/org/jenkins/ci/plugins/jobimport/client/RestApiClient.java that allows attackers with the ability to control the HTTP server (Jenkins) queried in preparation of job import to read arbitrary files, perform a denial of service attack, etc.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Remove:(general)
SOLUTIONS.Description: The vulnerability can be resolved by shutting down the vulnerable service(s), if they are not in use.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Upgrade:3.0
SOLUTIONS.Description:
Upgrade Jenkins CI, Job Import Plugin to version 3.0:
Upgrade to Job Import Plugin version 3.0 or later.

Title: Jenkins Pipeline Remote Loader <=1.4 Plugin Remote Sandbox Escape Vulnerability via Custom Whitelist - CVE-2019-10328
Discription: Jenkins Pipeline Remote Loader Plugin 1.4 and earlier provided a custom whitelist for script security that allowed attackers to invoke arbitrary methods, bypassing typical sandbox protection.
Scanners and Other Sources: Nessus, Qualys, Rapid7, and Symantec SecurityFocus BID

SOLUTIONS.Name: Remove:(general)
SOLUTIONS.Description: The vulnerability can be resolved by shutting down the vulnerable service(s), if they are not in use.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Upgrade:1.5
SOLUTIONS.Description:
Upgrade Jenkins CI, Pipeline Remote Loader to version 1.5:
This issue was solved in Jenkins CI Pipeline Remote Loader version 1.5. It is recommended to upgrade to this version or a later one. See Jenkins CI website for download details. https://github.com/jenkinsci/workflow-remote-loader-plugin/releases/tag/workflow-remote-loader-1.5

Title: Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin <=1.1.5 Remote CSRF Vulnerability - CVE-2019-10289
Discription: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin 1.1.5 and older in the NCScanBuilder.DescriptorImpl#doValidateAPI form validation method allowed attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Remove:(general)
SOLUTIONS.Description: The vulnerability can be resolved by shutting down the vulnerable service(s), if they are not in use.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Upgrade:1.1.6
SOLUTIONS.Description:
Upgrade Jenkins CI, Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin to version 1.1.6:
The issue is solved in Jenkins Netsparker Cloud Scan Plugin version 1.1.6.

Title: Jenkins Rundeck Plugin <=3.6.5 Remote CSRF Vulnerability - CVE-2019-10454
Discription: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Rundeck Plugin allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Remove:(general)
SOLUTIONS.Description: The vulnerability can be resolved by shutting down the vulnerable service(s), if they are not in use.

Title: Jenkins ontrack Plugin <=3.4 Sandbox Bypass Vulnerability - CVE-2019-10306
Discription: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins ontrack Plugin 3.4 and earlier allowed attackers with control over ontrack DSL definitions to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Remove:(general)
SOLUTIONS.Description: The vulnerability can be resolved by shutting down the vulnerable service(s), if they are not in use.

Title: Jenkins Openid Plugin CSRF Vulnerability in OpenIdSsoSecurityRealm.DescriptorImpl - CVE-2019-1003098
Discription: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins openid Plugin in the OpenIdSsoSecurityRealm.DescriptorImpl#doValidate form validation method allows attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Remove:(general)
SOLUTIONS.Description: The vulnerability can be resolved by shutting down the vulnerable service(s), if they are not in use.

Title: Jenkins Self-Organizing Swarm Plug-in Modules Plugin Remote File System Read Vulnerability - CVE-2019-10309
Discription: Jenkins Self-Organizing Swarm Plug-in Modules Plugin clients that use UDP broadcasts to discover Jenkins masters do not prevent XML External Entity processing when processing the responses, allowing unauthorized attackers on the same network to read arbitrary files from Swarm clients.

SOLUTIONS.Name: Remove:(general)
SOLUTIONS.Description: The vulnerability can be resolved by shutting down the vulnerable service(s), if they are not in use.
